flawed_nl_solution:
Her card has a $150 balance and she makes a $50 payment so the new balance is 150-50 = $<<150-50=1000>>1000
She didn't pay it off so she is charged 20% interest on her $1000 balance so the interest is 0.2*1000 = $200
Her balance was $1000 and she was charged $200 in interest so her new balance is 1000+200 = $<<1000+200=1200>>1200
#### 1200

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100, not 1000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
